title: Effective Design Strategies for Learning Breaks and Exam Preparation Periods

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic curriculum design and understanding of assessment methods
context.additional_context: Mobile-based intensive short-term course for pre-service/in-service teachers to strengthen social studies pedagogy competencies

learning_goals: Explain at least three strategies to enhance learning engagement when designing learning breaks and exam preparation periods
Apply methods to evaluate the effectiveness of break/preparation periods using learning analytics data
Develop a framework for designing break periods and assessment preparation tailored to module-specific characteristics
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
